project.projtitle: Development of a Voice Ticketing System
project.funding_agency: General Secretariat of Research and Technology
project.funding_programme: Development of Industrial Research and Technology in New Businesses (PAVET-NE)
project.description: The project's scope is the conduction of applied research in the area of voice ticketing with the aim to develop a voice ticketing product capable to improve an information and ticket reservation service. The system will be developed based on Automated Speech Recognition (ASR) and Text-to-Speech (TTS) technologies. It will be a truly innovative solution since it will operate only through voice commands. Potential application areas include the tourism industry, transportation, the culture and entertainment industries.
